title: The Furthest I've been from Home...
name: The Furthest I've been from Home...
description:
A Map by Sself1

A travelogue

properties.name: Atlanta, GA
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Visited here the most of any city. Lots of fun things to do. Home of Adult Swim. :)

properties.name: Caernarfon Castle
properties.description: Posted by Sself1An enormous castle in Wales. We lost a traveler here, but they evetually caught up with us somewhere close to Bath, England.

properties.name: Columbia, Missouri
properties.description: Posted by Sself1The furthest west of home I have ever been, but I hope to change that soon with a road trip to California in the fall.

properties.name: Dublin
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Dublin, IrelandThe first foreign country I set foot in. Also, my favorite place I have ever visited. Highlights: Guinness brewery and just walking the streets.

properties.name: Edinburgh, Scotland
properties.description: Posted by Sself1One of the prettiest and most interesting places I have been.

properties.name: Grasmere, England
properties.description: Posted by Sself1The most beautiful place I have ever seen. Beatrice Potter wrote books here and William Wordworth composed many poems in the garden of Dove Cottage where he lived for quite some time.

properties.name: Lenoir City, TN
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Home sweet home...

properties.name: London, England
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Lots to do here... too much in fact. We spent too little time here to truly experience it. Saw the Changing of the Guard, the Tower of London, and various other touristy spots. Pretty cool, overall.

properties.name: Minneapolis, Minnesota
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Awesome city, unlike any other. The only northern city in the U.S. I have been to so far, if you don\'t count those that I have flown through (Chicago and Newark).

properties.name: Murfreesboro, TN
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Not the furthest I\'ve been from home, but definitely the longest I\'ve been away...

properties.name: Orlando/Kissimmee, FL
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Annual vacation spot...

properties.name: Savannah, GA
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Very pretty, old town. Highlights: Tybee Island lighthouse and great seafood.

properties.name: Somewhere between Dun Laoghaire and Holyhead on the Irish Sea
properties.description: Posted by Sself1The only time I have ever been sea sick... and the only time I have ever wanted to die.

properties.name: St. Petersburg/Tampa, FL
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Furthest south of home.

properties.name: Stratford-upon-Avon
properties.description: Posted by Sself1Anne Hathaway\'s cottage... I was yelled at by a grumpy old english man here for laying my head on a tourmate\'s shoulder. I also saw Measure for Measure by William Shakespeare at the Royal Shakespeare Theatre.

properties.name: York, England
properties.description: Posted by Sself1York Minster is very impressive, a sight to behold.
